Alberth manifiesta que su mayor propósito es fortalecer y hacer crecer su negocio, para así poder dar a su familia, la oportunidad de tener una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.
texts.en:
Alberth, age 29, is a hard-working man.  He has been working in his own tailoring shop for four years.  It is located in a space in his house.  He works there with various members of his family.  This trade has become the only source of family income.

He is currently requesting a loan to buy supplies wholesale (fabrics, thread, buttons, zippers) and for maintenance on his machines.  This will allow him to provide better quality service and to keep a good relationship with his customers.  It will guarantee satisfaction upon delivering a well finished product.

Alberth states that his greatest objective is to strengthen his business and to make it grow.  This way he will be able to give his family the opportunity to have a better quality of life and better well-being.

loans.use: to buy supplies wholesale (fabrics, thread, buttons, zippers) and to perform maintenance on his machines.

loans.name: Rita

texts.en:
Rita is 33 years old and a hardworking lady from the small town of Mayanaguri in Jaipaiguri District. She lives with her husband and three children. All of their children go to school. She is illiterate and only able to sign her name.
 
Her husband is a farmer but his income is not sufficient to bear all the expenses of the family. Rita decided to start her business to help her husband to  maintain a good livelihood and to give financial support to her family. They have land just two miles away from her home where the land and weather are very much favorable for tea cultivation. She also has knowledge of farming. So, Rita decided to cultivate tea on that land, since there is a great demand for tea in that area. She wants to take a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase saplings and fertilizers.

In the future, with the profit from her business, she dreams of earning more money for her family’s well-being. She accepts all the hazards of life that come her way and tries to solve all those with an exceptional inner strength.  

She is the shining example of Maynaguri and she thanks BJS and Kiva for their financial support.

loans.use: To purchase saplings and fertilizers to cultivate tea

loans.name: Sukiman

texts.en:
Sukiman lives north of Bogor, about two hours from Jakarta. Sukiman manages a small shop selling snacks, groceries and mobile phone airtime credit.  Sukiman is married and lives with three persons in the family home.

Sukiman joined Ruma one month ago because he found it interesting to sell mobile phone airtime credits.  With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Sukiman sees improvements in his shop.  For the last month, he earns an average of $2-3 per day in mobile phone airtime credit sales.  He hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions on the weekends.  His goal for his business is to expand and have more new business in the future.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Amparo Guillermina

texts.es:
Amparo es una mujer pujante y dedicada a su familia, madre de 1 hijo al que ha sacado adelante sola, pues su esposo falleció y toda la responsabilidad y la carga económica recayó sobre ella. Con el fin de generar recursos para solventar los gastos básicos del hogar, inició una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en un espacio de su vivienda y, de manera adicional prepara tamales y los vende entre sus amigos y vecinos del sector, para complementar los ingresos.
El crédito que solicita está destinado para realizar adecuaciones en la cocina y mejorar las condiciones de trabajo, así podrá preparar los alimentos con un nivel de higiene adecuado y así garantizar a sus clientes un producto de excelente calidad y sabor, lo que se reflejará en el incremento de las ventas y por ende, los ingresos.
Amparo manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es tener su tienda en un local más amplio para tener mayor capacidad de almacenamiento y mejorar el nivel de ventas, así podrá garantizar una estabilidad financiera para brindarle educación universitaria a su hijo y dar mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Amparo is a vibrant woman who is dedicated to her family. She is the mother of one son whom she has raised alone, since her husband died and all the responsibility and economic burden fell on her. With the goal of generating income to pay the basic household expenses, she set up a little grocery store in a space in her home, and in addition she prepares tamales and sells them among her friends and neighbors in the sector to supplement her income.

The loan that she is applying for is destined to make some changes in the kitchen and improve her working conditions. With this she will be able to prepare her foods with an appropriate level of hygiene and thus guarantee her customers a product of excellent quality and flavor, which will be reflected in an increase in her sales and, as a result, her income.

Amparo states that her greatest wish is to have her store in a more spacious location in order to have a greater storage capacity and to improve her level of sales. Thus she will be able to guarantee financial stability in order to offer a university education to her son and give a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to make changes in her kitchen and improve her working conditions

loans.name: Sri

texts.en:
Sri lives north of Bogor, about two hours from Jakarta. Sri manages a small shop selling snacks and mobile phone airtime credit.  Sri is married and lives with five persons in the family home. 

Sri joined Ruma one month ago because she found it interesting to sell mobile phone airtime credits.  With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Sri sees improvements in her shop.  For the last month, she earned an average of $1-2  per day in mobile phone airtime credit sales.  She hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions on the weekends.  Her goal for her business is to expand and have more new business in the future

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for a more efficient cooking gas system

loans.name: Leonel Eduardo

texts.es:
Leonel se dedica a la agricultura, se creció con sus padres quienes se dedicaban arduamente a la agricultura y ganadería su familia era formada por 3 hermanos quienes ayudaban en las tareas agrícolas de su hogar.

Leonel carece de una formación académica, ya que su familia era de escasos recursos económicos; por esa razón se le dificulto el acceso a la educación y decidió trabajar la agricultura junto con su padre y sus hermanos. De esta forma se independizo y se acompaño con quien son padres de una niña de 2 años de edad, su compañera de vida se dedica a realizar los oficios domésticos de su hogar y a la vez a la prestación de servicios domésticos en el cual recibe un salario mensual según los días laborados.

Leonel se dedica a la agricultura específicamente a la siembra de granos básicos, actividad que aprendió de su  padre con quien se creció y dedico toda su vida a realizar esta actividad y se sentía orgulloso de trabajar la tierra junto a sus hijos, a esta actividad se suma su esposa quien le prepara los alimentos cada mañana con mucho dedicación y empeño para que él se disponga a comenzar el día de labores agrícolas.


El dinero del prestamo sera utilizado para la compra de materiales para construir un corredor en su casa y pavimentar el piso de la misma. El crédito le mejorara la condición de vida, ya que así podrá tener una casa con mejores condiciones  puesto que el corredor que realizara le servirá para descansar y a la vez para guardar leña y tendrá una casa mas amplia.    

Los sueños que el cliente tiene son los de tener su casa amplia y en buenas condiciones,  ya quiere repellar las paredes de su casa para que no se deteriore, ademas adquirir un crédito para arreglar una galera comenzar a trabajar con granja de gallinas ponedoras.
texts.en:
Leonel works in agricultural.  He grew up with his parents, who worked arduously in agricultural and with livestock.  His family was comprised of three siblings, who helped with the household’s agricultural work.  

Leonel does not have a formal education because his family had scarce financial resources.  For this reason, it was difficult for him to access an education.  He decided to work in agriculture with his father and siblings.  In this way he became independent.  He is in a relationship, and they have a two year old daughter.  His life partner devotes herself to the household chores.  She also provides domestic services and receives a monthly salary according to the days worked.

Leonel grows basic grains, a business activity that he learned from his father, who he grew up with.  He dedicated his whole life to this business activity, and he was proud to work the land with his children.  His wife has been added to this activity, and she prepares the food with a lot of dedication and effort every morning.  She does this so that he is ready to start his day of doing agricultural work.

The money from the loan will be used to buy materials to build a hall in his house and to pave the hall floor.  The loan will improve his living conditions.  This way he will be able to have a house with better conditions given that the hallway that he will build will be used to rest and to store firewood.  He will have a bigger house.

Leonel’s dream is to have a bigger house that is in good condition.  He wants to plaster the walls of his house so that they do not deteriorate.  He also wants to get a loan to set up a chicken coop and to start working with a farm of laying hens.

loans.use: to buy materials to build a hall in his house and to pave the hall floor.

loans.name: Gabriel Isaac

texts.es:
Gabriel  es una persona de 23 años de edad,  se dedica a la agricultura ya que es el oficio al cual se ha dedicado desde pequeño,  Gabriel carece de formación académica, ya que él proviene de una familia de escasos recursos económicos y el acceso a los servicios de educación le quedaba muy lejos por vivir en la zona rural y lejos del pueblo donde se encontraba la escuela nacional. Gabriel vive con su esposa , ella se dedica a los Oficios domésticos de su hogar y ademas tiene su propio negocio de venta de ropa en su casa ,  su hijo de 5 años de edad se encuentra estudiando educación básica en el Centro Escolar de la comunidad.

 Gabriel se dedica a la agricultura específicamente a la siembra de granos básicos y también a la prestación de servicios de ayudante de albañil. Él se dedica la agricultura desde hace 15 años, actividad que aprendió de sus padres, que dedicaron toda su vida a realizar dicha actividad, el trabaja en un horario de 6:00 am a 12:00 md; ademas se dedica la crianza de cerdos y a cuidar unas vacas que son de su propiedad.

El dinero otorgado en calidad de préstamo sera invertido en la compra de una vaca en estado de gestación, de esta manera mejorara su calidad de vida mediante la producción de lácteos que le servirá para vender y alimentar a  su familia y una fuente adicional de ingreso económico
 

Las proyecciones que el joven Gabriel tiene a futuro, son las de tener mas ganado y aumentar su producción de granos básicos y de apoyar al desarrollo académico de su hijo ya que el sueño de este es el de ser ingeniero agronomo. Con ayuda de futuros créditos  realizara proyectos que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de  su  familia.
texts.en:
Gabriel is a 23 -year-old, he works in agriculture as it is the work which he has been doing since childhood. Gabriel has no academic training since he comes from a family of limited financial resources and had no access to education services because he was living in a rural area far from the town where  there was a national school. Gabriel lives with his wife.  She takes care of the domestic chores and also has her own business selling clothes at home. Their five-year-old is studying basic education in the school in their community.

Gabriel is engaged in agriculture, specifically planting basic grains and also performs the services of assistant bricklayer. He has been engaged in agriculture for 15 years which he learned from his parents.  He has dedicated his life to this activity and works from 6:00 am to 12:00 noon.  In addition, he raises pigs and cares for cows that he owns.

The money from this loan will be invested in the purchase of a dairy cow, thus improving their quality of their life by producing milk to sell and serve to provide his family an additional source of income.
 
The hope that young Gabriel has for the future is to have more cattle and increase production of basic grains and to support the academic development of his child whose dream is to be agricultural engineer . With the help of the loan he will undertake projects to improve the quality of his life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a cow for milk production.

loans.name: Tri

texts.en:
Tri lives north of Bogor, about two hours from Jakarta. Tri manages a small shop selling mobile accessories and mobile phone airtime credit.  Tri is married and lives with five persons in the family home.

Tri joined Ruma one month ago because he found it interesting to sell mobile phone airtime credits.  With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Tri sees improvements in his shop.  For the last month, he earned an average of $1-2 per day in mobile phone airtime credit sales.  He hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions on the weekends.  His goal for his business is to expand and have more new business in the future.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Desih

texts.en:
Desih lives north of Bogor, about two hours from Jakarta. Desih manages a small shop selling groceries and mobile phone airtime credit.  Desih is married and lives with six persons in the family home. 

Desih joined Ruma one month ago because she found it interesting to sell mobile phone airtime credits.  With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Desih sees improvements in her shop.  For the last month, she earned an average of $8 - 9 per day in mobile phone airtime credit sales.  She hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions on the weekends.  Her goal for her business is to expand and have more new business in the future

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Al

texts.en:
Al lives north of Bogor, about two hours from Jakarta. Al manages a small shop selling mobile accessories, service hand phones and mobile phone airtime credit.  Al is married and lives with three persons in the family home.

Al joined Ruma one month ago because he found it interesting to sell mobile phone airtime credits.  With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Al sees improvements in his shop.  For the last month, he earned an average of $27- 28 per day in mobile phone airtime credit sales.  He hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions on the weekends.  His goal for his business is to expand and have more new business in the future.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Subhan

texts.en:
Subhan lives north of Bogor, about two hours from Jakarta. Subhan manages a small shop selling mobile accessories, groceries and mobile phone airtime credit.  Subhan is single and lives with three persons in the family home.

Subhan joined Ruma one month ago because he found it interesting to sell mobile phone airtime credits.  With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Subhan sees improvements in his shop.  For the last month, he earned an average of $7- 8 per day in mobile phone airtime credit sales.  He hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions on the weekends.  His goal for his business is to expand and have more new business in the future.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Jaka

texts.en:
Jaka lives north of Bogor, about two hours from Jakarta. Jaka manages a small shop selling mobile accessories and mobile phone airtime credit.  Jaka is married and lives with three persons in the family home.

Jaka joined Ruma one month ago because he found it interesting to sell mobile phone airtime credits. With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Jaka sees improvements in his shop.  For the last month, he earned an average of $15 - 16 per day in mobile phone airtime credit sales.  He hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions on the weekends.  His goal for his business is to expand and have more new business in the future.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Herlan

texts.en:
Herlan lives north of Bogor, about two hours from Jakarta. Herlan manages a small shop selling mobile accessories and mobile phone airtime credit.  Herlan is married and lives with three persons in the family home. In the picture, Herlan appears with his son.

Herlan joined Ruma one month ago because he found it interesting to sell mobile phone airtime credits.  With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Herlan sees improvements in his shop.  For the last month, he earned an average of $5 - 6 per day in mobile phone airtime credit sales.  He hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions on the weekends.  His goal for his business is to expand and have more new business in the future.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Sadia

texts.en:
Sadia is a 28-year-old lady, living with her husband and a son in Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband owns a small jewelry shop, in which he manufactures artificial jewelry such as bracelets, bangles, lockets, necklaces, rings, and earrings. He wants to buy raw material to increase his manufacturing capacity so he can generate extra income to cherish his family.
 
Therefore, Sadia has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so he can buy raw material such as nickel and chemicals for metal shining. With the help of his profits, he will set up the artificial jewelry to sell directly. 

Sadia is very thankful to Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy raw material for her husband's jewelry making business

loans.name: Abida

texts.en:
Abida is a 32-year-old married woman. She lives with her husband in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She does embroidery work by hand at home and is financially supporting her family.

Abida belongs to a poor family. Her husband’s income is very poor so she decided to start embroidery work at home. She learned this art in her childhood, and now she adopted it for her occupation. She enabled herself independently and is earning a sufficient income. She has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase stocks of thread, silk, fancy sequins and pearls of various colors. She hopes that this loan will prove beneficial for her and for her family. Abida is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as threads, silk, fancy sequins and pearls of various colors for embroidery.

loans.name: Mimi

texts.en:
Mimi lives north of Bogor, about two hours from Jakarta. Mimi manages a small shop selling mobile accessories and mobile phone airtime credit.  Mimi is single and lives with two persons in the family home. 

Mimi joined Ruma one month ago because she found it interesting to sell mobile phone airtime credits.  With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Mimi sees improvements in her shop. For the last month, she earned an average of $7 - 8 per day in mobile phone airtime credit sales.  She hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions on the weekends.  Her goal for her business is to expand and have more new business in the future

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Stanley

texts.en:
Stanley, 36 years old, is from Nyahururu. He is married to Lillian and they are blessed with two children who are 1 and 7 years old.

He has been running his tailoring business for the last 15 years. To enable him to buy sewing thread, clothing material and a sewing machine to use in making clothes for his customers, he has applied for his fourth loan of KES 100,000 from VisionFund Kenya.

His monthly income right now is KES 25,000 and his intention is to use the anticipated profits from his expanded business to educate his children and to pay back his loan to VisionFund Kenya.

In the future, he hopes to be a successful businessman

loans.use: To buy thread, fasteners, clothing material and a sewing machine

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis used the previous loan to buy rice and sugar to sell. He has been in the retail business for six years and has a motorcycle transport business for additional income. Francis started his business to improve his life and wants a loan to buy sodas, maize flour and cosmetics. Francis hopes to open another shop. However, price fluctuations and high license fees are challenges he faces.

loans.use: to buy soda, maize flour and cosmetics

loans.name: Nora

texts.es: La Señora  Nora tiene 42 años  casada y con dos  hijos de las edades de 17 y 12 años,  ella se dedica a la venta de desayunos ella vende api con pastel en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en su mismo domicilio por la zona  de Villa Adela,  el destino del crédito es para la compra de insumos al por mayor como Azúcar, Harina y  aceite al por mayor para elaboración de sus comidas, la señora Nora es una persona muy trabajadora lleva años en esta actividad está muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado a ella ya que esta es la única actividad con la que mantiene a su familia.
texts.en: Señora Nora is 42 years old. She is married and has two children, ages 17 and 12. She sells breakfasts. She sells api (a beverage made from corn, sugar, and cinnamon) with fried cheese pastries from her sales stand, which is in her home in the Villa Adela zone. The purpose of the loan is to buy wholesale supplies such as sugar, flour, and oil to make her foods. Señora Nora is a very hard-working person. She has worked in this business for years. She is very grateful to the institution for the support offered to her, since this is the only activity with which she supports her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make api (a corn-based beverage) and fried cheese pastries.

loans.name: José María

texts.es:
José de 33 años de edad, se dedica a la agricultura y cuenta con una experiencia de 15 años, ademas ejerce el oficio de albañil y lo hace desde hace 5 años; el cliente vive en su mamá, que es con quien se ha crecido y es ella quien le ha inculcado buenos principios morales y espirituales, el joven se dedica a prestar servicios como albañil y ya que esta actividad la aprendió de su padre que se dedico toda su vida a trabajar esta actividad.


El préstamo sera utilizado para el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que una parte del techo se encuentra en malas condiciones y ya se acerca la época de invierno y es necesario hacer una reparación y mejoramiento y utilizara el crédito para comprar laminas para poner en el techo.


Los planes que tiene para el futuro,son  tener la vivienda con todos los servicios básicos en excelentes condiciones, adquirir otro préstamo para comprar un vehículo, casarse y tener una familia.
texts.en:
José is 33 years old. He works in agriculture and has 15 years of experience. In addition, he performs the work of a mason, and he has been doing this for 5 years. He lives with his mother, who raised him. She is the one who instilled in him good moral and spiritual principles. This young man offers services as a mason. He learned this work from his father, who worked in this area all his life.

The loan will be used to improve his house, since part of the roof is in bad condition, and the winter season is approaching, so it is necessary to make the repair and improvement. He will use the loan to buy metal sheeting to put on the roof.

The plans that he has for the future are to have the house with all the basic services in excellent condition, to acquire another loan to buy a vehicle, and to marry and have a family.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: G.s A.m.s Group

texts.es:
El g.s  A.M.S  está conformado por tres integrantes mujeres madres solteras con ocho hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Son originarias de Nagarote lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. Nagarote se caracteriza por su comida típica como es el quesillo. Estas personas se caracterizan por ser trabajadoras, responsables con ganas de superación personal, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudieron estudiar, en la actualidad luchan día a día para brindarle un futuro mejor a sus hijos.

Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante la coordinadora  es Gema   tiene por actividad económica la venta cosméticos, actividad que la desempeña de forma ambulante y en su casa de habitación. Ella dedica a su negocio unas ocho horas diarias ofreciendo su producto. Como rubor, sombra de ojos, lápiz de ojos, delineador, crema hidratantes, perfumes. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos de cosméticos para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. El g.s A.M.S agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y pases pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
GS AMS is made up of three single mothers who have eight children in their care.  They are native to Nagarote, located in the western part of the country.  Nagarote is known for their traditional food like quesillo (a soft cheese).  
These women are characterized by being hard-working, responsible and with a desire for self improvement.   Sadly, due to a lack of financial resources they weren't able to study a career.  Currently, they struggle daily to give their children a better future thanks to their effort and desire to move forward.
Gema is the coordinator of the group and she works selling cosmetics on the street and from her house.  She dedicates around 8 hours a day offering her products like blush, eye shadow, eye pencil, eyeliner, hydrating lotions, and perfumes.  
The goal of this loan is to invest in working capital and stock her business in buying and selling cosmetic products so that in a not-so-distant future she can obtain a better income.  
The GS AMS is grateful for the help Kiva investors give people of limited resources and poor countries like Nicaragua so they can have a dignified job.

loans.use: to invest in working capital to stock their business with cosmetic products like blush, eye shadow, eye pencil, eyeliner, hydrating lotions and perfumes.

loans.name: José Trinidad

texts.es:
José de 45 años de edad,  estudio hasta segundo grado de nivel académico,  está acompañado la esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos ha procreado 5 hijos en este matrimonio y de los cuales dos de ellos están estudiando una de ella está trabajando y dos que pasan en la casa con la mamá con José viven 4 hijos y la esposa por lo tanto solo ellos dependen de él.

José se dedica a la albañilería  desde que tenía 13 años de edad, este trabajo lo aprendió trabajando de ayudante de un tio que lo llevaba al trabajo y con el tiempo aprendió bien el trabajo y decidio dedicarce de lleno a este oficio ya que le genera muchos ingresos; pero José tambien se dedica a la agricultura cuando tiene libre que no trabaja de albañil, entonces trabaja la tierra para los cultivos esto lo hace solo; ya que los hijos estan estudiando y lo hace en un horario de 7am a 12m lo de la agricultura, pero el de albañil lo hace de las 7am a 4 pm. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para pagar el alquiler de la tierra donde el cultiva el maíz;  ya que ha decidido cultivar porque el tiempo de la albañilería no está siendo muy demandado y el trabajara lo de la tierra, esto le ayudara mucho porque va a tener el maíz en su casa para la familia y que no les falte el alimento en la casa. 

Los sueños que tiene es que siempre Dios le preste vida para seguir trabajando de albañil,  ya que este trabajo da muchos ingresos en las épocas que salen las construcciones y así tener muchos ingresos en su familia que sus hijos se preparen en los estudios.
texts.en:
José, 45, studied through second grade. His wife works in the home and they have five children, two of whom are in school, one who works, and two who stay at home with their mother. Four of his children live at home with him and his wife.

Jose has worked as a mason since he was 13, a trade that he learned by helping his uncle who took Jose to work with him. Over time he learned the work well and decided to make it his trade because it creates a lot of income. Jose is also a farmer in his free time, and when he doesn't have masonry jobs he works on the land alone. His children are in school when he usually farms in the mornings from 7am to 12pm; his masonry jobs can go from 7am to 4pm.

He asks for this loan to pay to rent the land where he grows corn. He has decided to do this because masonry is not in high demand right now. It will be helpful to have corn at home for the family so that they have something to eat. His dreams are that God continues to give him life to keep working as a mason, since this job gives him a lot of income during construction season and with the money he can ensure his children go to school.

loans.use: to pay rent on the land where he grows corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair the roof on his house.

loans.name: Edwin Ricardo

texts.es:
Edwin es un joven de 24 años de edad, con excelentes referencias personales dedicado y con buenos principios morales lo que lo han llevado a ser una buena persona. Él se dedica a la prestación de servicios  en la junta de agua potable de su comunidad, es el encargado de hacer las lecturas en los medidores de consumo de agua potable en cada uno de los hogares.

Edwin se creció con sus padres quienes se dedicaban a la agricultura, mientras vivió con sus padres se dedico a realizar sus estudios en el Centro Escolar de su comunidad , donde alcanzo el 9º grado, luego continuo sus estudios en el Instituto Nacional donde se graduó de Bachillerato General, después de haber culminado sus estudios de educación media se dedico a trabajar en la junta de agua potable de su comunidad y es donde actualmente trabaja, tiene que viajar aproximadamente 20 km diarios para  completar su rutina diaria, y esto lo hace gracias a que su hermano mayor le presta su motocicleta.

El joven esta acompañado, con quien son padres de una niña de 4 años,  su compañera de vida trabaja de secretaria en las oficinas de la junta de agua de su comunidad y también realiza los oficios domésticos de su casa. 

El dinero sera utilizado para comprar una motocicleta, la que le servirá para viajar con mayor comodidad a su lugar de trabajo y realizar sus rutas de trabajo por toda la comunidad de esta manera le permitirá regresar a su casa mas temprano, para convivir con su familia y pasar mas tiempo con sus seres queridos.


Las proyecciones que tiene para futuro son las de cancelar el crédito y continuar trabajando con la institución que le ha brindado la oportunidad de realizar sus proyectos a corto plazo  y hacer una nueva solicitud de crédito para construir su casa y apoyar en los estudios de su hija hasta que sea una profesional.
texts.en:
Edwin, 24, has excellent personal references. He is dedicated, with strong moral principles that have made him into a good person. Edwin and his partner have a 4 year old daughter. He works for the water directive in his community and is in charge of reading the potable water meters on all of the houses. His wife works as a secretary for the water directive and also takes care of the home.

Edwin grew up with his parents, who were farmers, and he went to a local school through the 9th grade. Later he continued his studies at the National Institute where he got his general diploma. After completing his studies, he started his job with the water company in his town where he continues to work.

He has to travel around 20km every day to complete his rounds, and is able to do this thanks to his older brother who lends him a motorcycle. He will use the loan to buy a motorcycle so that he can travel more easily to work and on his routes throughout the community. This will allow him to get home earlier and spend more time with his family and loved ones. His goals for the future are to pay off this loan and keep working with the institution that has given him the opportunity to realize his short-term objectives by making a new request for a loan to build a house and support his daughter's education.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase supplies wholesale (fabric, thread, buttons, zips)

loans.name: Blanca Alicia

texts.es: Blanca es una mujer de 37 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto  a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 17 años y 15 años de edad. Blanca se gana la vida mediante la elaboración y venta de tortillas. El negocio lo tiene desde hace 15 años aproximadamente por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y desea mejorar sus condiciones de vida por lo que desea invertir en su negocio con el fin de abarcar una mayor cuota de mercado y aumentar las ventas y sus ingresos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de maíz, gas propano y cal.
texts.en:
Blanca, 37, lives in her own house with her husband and two children aged 17 and 15.  Blanca earns a living by preparing and selling tortillas.  She has had this business for 15 years and has a lot of loyal customers who think her food gets better and better.  Her family is the most important thing to her and she wants to improve their standard of living by investing in her business in order to gain more customers and increase her sales and profits.  

Therefore, she is asking for a loan through FUSAI to buy corn, gas, and lime powder.

loans.use: to buy corn, propane gas, and lime powder for her tortilla making business.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
Susana es una persona de 48 años de edad que se dedica a los oficios domésticos y al comercio ya que es propietaria de una tienda ubicada en su casa y también se dedica al cuidado de sus dos hijas.
 
Ella se creció con sus padres quienes se dedicaban al comercio, los días domingo en la plaza del pueblo y los demás días de la semana a los trabajos agrícolas, ella realizo sus estudios de educación básica hasta 5º grado en la escuela nacional y no pudo continuar sus estudios porque su familia es de escasos recursos y ella es una de las hermanas mayores; por lo cual dejo de estudiar y se dedicó al negocio de la familia, con el paso del tiempo decidió abrir su propio negocio en el cual comenzó con venta de productos de primera necesidad y en la actualidad comercializa granos básicos también. Expresa que tiene un experiencia de 20 años realizando esta actividad que fue producto de la enseñanza de su madre,  la cual dedico mucho tiempo a realizar este negocio, y es el que en la actualidad realiza y se encuentra en mucha disposición ya que le motivan las ganancias que este mismo negocio le deja,  aparte de que no tiene que movilizarse a ningún lugar de trabajo ya que el negocio está en su casa, y de esta manera tiene tiempo para cuidar a sus hijas que se encuentran estudiando en bachillerato en el instituto.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para ampliar y mejorar su tienda, ya que por la temporada de ferias patronales de su pueblo la demanda de productos básicos y golosinas le aumenta y necesita surtir su negocio para prestar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, y obtener más ganancias económicas  

Las proyecciones que ella tiene para un futuro son las de fortalecer su negocio y tener un local más amplio que le permita establecerse con una venta de comida los días de semana y apoyar el estudio de sus hijos hasta que sean unos profesionales graduados, con el beneficio que le brinda el préstamo utilizara las ganancias para invertir y mejorar su casa ampliar y surtir su negocio y hará una nueva solicitud de crédito para comprar un molino de nixtamal;  ya que en su comunidad el primer molino está a 1 km de distancia.
texts.en:
Susana, 48, divides her time between doing the housework, running a shop from home and looking after her two daughters.

She grew up with her parents who were traders on Sundays in the main square of the village, and who worked the rest of the week in agriculture.  She studied until 5th grade at school but couldn’t continue studying because her family didn’t have the means to support her, and also because as the older sister, she felt the need to help out with the family business.  As time went by, she decided to open her own shop selling basic household products.  She now offers basic grains as well.  She has 20 years’ experience now and learnt everything from her mother.  She spent a lot of time establishing this business and she is highly motivated by the profits she makes.  It also has the added benefit that she doesn’t have to leave home to do it, so she has plenty of time to look after her daughters who are studying in their final years at school.

She will use the loan from CREDICAMPO to expand and improve her store.  The local festival season is approaching and there is always a high demand in her village during this time for her products and for candies.  She needs to stock her store so that she can offer the best service to her customers and generate some income.

In the future, she would like to strengthen her business and have a bigger store where she can also sell food during the week, which will allow her to pay for her daughters’ education until they graduate.  With the profits she makes, she will invest in her house to make improvements and continue to stock her store.  She is planning to ask for another loan in the future to buy a Nixtamal corn mill, as the nearest one she can use is 1 km away.

loans.use: to expand and improve her shop in time for the festival season in her village when there is a high demand for her products.

loans.name: El Rosario Group

texts.es: El grupo “El Rosario” está conformada por 07 socios responsables y emprendedores. Carmen de 31 años es separada y  tiene 03 hijos dependientes. Ella se dedica a la venta de leche, se viene desempeñando hace más de 3 año donde le va bien. Gracias a su esfuerzo puede brindarles  educación a sus hijos. El deseo de Carmen es de seguir implementando su negocio con prendas de vestir. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para la compra de camisas, polos y pantalones. El grupo “El Rosario” agradece  por hacer posible este crédito. Carmen se encuentra de pie en la parte posterior es la  tercera del lado izquierdo y viste bivirí rojo.
texts.en:
The “El Rosario” group is made up of seven enterprising and responsible members.  Carmen, 31, is separated and has three children who depend on her.  She sells milk, a successful business she has had for more than three years.  Thanks to her hard work, she can provide for her children’s education.

Her dream is to continue supplying her business with clothes.  That is why she is asking for a loan to buy shirts, polo shirts and pants.  

The group is very grateful for the loans.  Carmen is standing at the back of the photograph; she is the third on the left in the red top.

loans.use: to buy shirts, polo shirts and pants.

loans.name: Héctor Fabio

texts.es:
Héctor,  a sus 36 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus 4 hijos, a los que han sacado adelante con esmero y dedicación.
Desde hace 8 años se dedica a trabajar como comerciante independiente, pues tiene un puesto de venta de alimentos fritos y una chaza donde vende dulces y mecato, está ubicado a las afueras de una institución educativa y trabaja en compañía de su esposa de lunes a sábado desde las primeras horas de la mañana.
El crédito que solicita será invertido en la compra de insumos y surtido (papas, aceite, plátanos, mecato, dulces) y realizar mejoras al carro de comidas (pintar), esto le permitirá mejorar la imagen de su negocio y hacerlo más llamativo para los clientes, además podrá ofrecer mayor variedad de productos y satisfacer los diversos gustos, esto se reflejará en el incremento de las ventas y los ingresos para su familia.
Héctor manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es tener un local propio en el que pueda montar su negocio de comidas rápidas y así evitar los diferentes riesgos a los que está expuesto por trabajar en la calle, esto sería un avance para mejorar las condiciones de vida y bienestar para sus hijos y su amada esposa.
texts.en:
Hector, 36, lives with his wife and four children, who they have raised with care and dedication.

For eight years, he has been working as an independent trader.  He has got a food stall where he sells fried food and a food cart from which he sells a variety of snacks and candies.  It is located outside a school and his wife helps him at work from Monday to Saturday from the early hours of the morning.
He is asking for a loan to invest in supplies and stock (chips, oil, bananas, snacks, candies) and to make improvements to his food cart (paint).  This will help him improve the image of his business and attract more customers.  He will also be able to offer a wider range of products to satisfy the demand.  As a result, he will generate more income for his family.

His greatest desire is to have his own place where he can set up a fast-food restaurant.  In doing this he can move away from street selling and the different problems and risks that this type of work has.  His own place would be a significant step towards improving the standard of living of his children and his wife, who he loves a lot.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as chips, oil, bananas, snacks and candies; and also to buy paint to make improvements to his food cart.

loans.name: Alejandra Beatriz

texts.es: Alejandra tiene 25 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo quien es agricultor y con quien han procreado dos hijos de 4 años y 4 meses de edad. Alejandra es una mujer con visión emprendedora dado que busca las oportunidades para ofrecer variedad de antojitos típicos como: yuca frita, atoles y enchiladas. El negocio lo tiene adecuado en su hogar de habitación y cuenta con mucha experiencia por lo que cada día son más las personas que solicitan sus productos. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de insumos como: yuca, repollo, tomates, maíz, aceite, etc. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento dado que no cuenta con los recursos necesarios para hacerlo por su cuenta pero si con la capacidad para cancelar las cuotas que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Alejandra, 25, lives in her own house with her husband who works in agriculture.  They have two children, one four years old and the other, four months.  Alejandra is a visionary entrepreneur since she looks for opportunities to offer a variety of typical snack foods such as fried yucca, cornflower drink and enchiladas.  Her business is set up in her home and she has acquired much experience, so she is visited every day by many people who buy her products.

She has decided to request a loan through FUSAI to buy supplies such as yucca plant, cabbage, tomatoes, corn, oil, etc.  She hopes to receive the loan since she does not have the resources she needs but does have the capacity to pay back the loan.

loans.use: To buy yucca plant, cabbage, tomatoes, corn, oil, etc.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is 62 years old from Nakuru. She is a widow, and she is blessed with five children who are adults.

She has been running her poultry business for the last 22 years and to enable her to complete some rental houses under construction, she has applied for her fourth loan of KES 90,000 from VisionFund Kenya.

Her monthly income right now is KES 15,000 and her intention is to use the anticipated profits from her expanded business to improve her poultry farming and to pay her loan back to VisionFund Kenya.

In the future, she hopes to be a successful businesswoman.

loans.use: To buy chicken feed and complete some rental houses which are under construction

loans.name: Pauline

texts.en:
Pauline lives in the Muranga area of Central Kenya with her family of three children, all of school going age. She has practiced farming for the past four years with her income being crops, eggs, and a retail business. Her biggest challenge is seasons of low sales.

Pauline chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan because they help small scale farmers in their farming projects. During the training, she learnt that micro finance institutions help fund small income earners. This loan will help her to start up dairy farming, which will bring more income and thus improve her family's living standards and also will pay for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Oralia Margarita

texts.es:
Oralia es una mujer luchadora y activa, madre de un hijo de 11 años al que ha sacado adelante sola, pues se separó de su esposo y toda la carga económica y la responsabilidad recayó sobre ella.
Tiene 43 años de edad, 15 de ellos, dedicada a trabajar en el campo de la belleza de manera independiente, tiene su propia sala de belleza en la que presta servicio de corte, cepillado y químicos, adicionalmente vende mercancía como ropa, cosméticos y productos de aseo, para complementar los ingresos y así poder velar por el bienestar de su hijo.
El crédito que solicita será utilizado en la compra de mercancía y herramientas de trabajo (ropa, accesorios, cosméticos, tijeras, tinturas, agua oxigenada), esto le permitirá continuar con su labor y prestar un servicio de mejor calidad, para lograr aumentar los ingresos.
Oralia manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder ampliar su negocio y generar oportunidades de empleo, lo que será benéfico para estabilizar sus finanzas familiares y dar a su hijo una mejor educación y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Oralia is a hard-working, active woman and the mother of an 11-year-old son who she has raised herself.  After divorcing her husband, all the economic burden and responsibility fell on her shoulders.

She is 43 years old and has worked 15 years independently as a hairdresser.  She runs her own beauty salon where she offers hair cuts, styling, and color; and she also sells merchandise such as clothing, cosmetics and personal care products to earn extra income for her son's well-being.

The loan she is requesting is to buy work supplies and tools (clothing, accessories, cosmetics, scissors, hair color, peroxide).  This will enable her to continue in her work and to provide better customer service so she can increase her income.

Oralia says her greatest dream is to expand her business and generate employment opportunities in order to stabilize her family economy and give her son a better education and quality lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy work supplies and tools (clothing, accessories, cosmetics, scissors, hair color, peroxide).

loans.name: Esfuerzo De Mujeres Group

texts.es: Yanet tiene 36 años de edad es soltera con un hijo educando. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas  mandarinas plátanos manzanas hace muchos años en un mercado. Años atrás se dedica a prestar servicios domésticos. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más frutas. En el grupo “ESFUERZO DE MUJERES” cumple la función de presidenta. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Yanet es la segunda del lado izquierdo.
texts.en:
Yanet, 36, is single and has a son.  She sells fruit such as tangerines, bananas and apples and has worked many years at the market.  Years ago she used to work as a domestic employee.  She will use the loan to buy more fruit.  

In the communal bank "ESFUERZO DE MUJERES", she is the president.  The group is grateful to KIVA lenders for the loan.  Yanet is pictured second from the left.

loans.use: To buy more fruit: apples, tangerines and bananas.

loans.name: Palabra De Mujer Group

texts.es: Este es el nuevo grupo “Palabra De Mujer” La cual  está constituida por 05 socios emprendedores y entusiastas. Ana de 36 años de edad es separada con 01 hijo dependiente. Ella es profesora  que viene desempeñándose hace más de 04 años. Así mismo se dedica a la venta de gas y tejido de manualidades lo que le permite tener un ingreso adicional a su hogar. Con el fruto de su esfuerzo ha podido mejorar su calidad de vida. Solicitó el crédito para la compra hilos, crochet  y botones. El grupo “Palabra de Mujer” agradece a todas las personas que facilitaron este crédito. Ana es la segunda del lado izquierdo y viste blusa celeste.
texts.en:
This new communal bank, "Palabra de Mujer" (A Woman's Word) is comprised of five enthusiastic members.  Ana, 36, is divorced and has a dependent son.  She has been working as a teacher for over four years.  She also sells gas and handicrafts to earn extra income for her household.  Through her hard work she has been able to improve her lifestyle.  The loan she is requesting is to buy thread, crochet hooks and buttons.

The "Palabra de Mujer" Group is grateful to the people who have provided this loan.  Ana is pictured second from the left in a blue top.

loans.use: To buy thread, crochet hooks and buttons.

loans.name: Cynndy Yhennyfert

texts.es:
La historia de una pequeña niña llamada yhennyfert comienza desde la infancia cuando con tan poca edad tenía claro lo que en realidad quería estudiar, ella tenía el propósito de ayudar a las personas sin esperar nada a cambio, cumpliendo con los sueños desde temprana edad, compartiendo cada alegría, cada deseo, cada anhelo, cada meta y cada propósito con quienes realmente creen en ella.
  
Ella trataba de cumplir los objetivos en el colegio destacándose en materias tales como Biología y matemáticas el cual le permitían crear nuevas ideas para así  poder  llegar a  una meta clara, aunque sufrió mucho en la vida ella  creía que eran cosas pasajeras y obstáculos que a todo el mundo se le presentaban, sin embargo la gran mentalidad le permitió seguir adelante, atravesando las vallas que se presentaban en el camino.

Termino el Bachillerato y sabia lo que quería desde pequeña, a la vez pensando de  donde sacaría el dinero  para cumplir el deseado sueño de ingresar a la mejor institución educativa contando con grandes grupos de apoyo, dando así el mejor esfuerzo, tiempo requerido y costos de donde no los hubiera, aportando lo mejor de ella para sacar adelante  la  carrera de Auxiliar en Enfermería, pensando así en un futuro, ya que ella tiene la capacidad para aportar grandes conocimientos en proyectos de prevención y promoción en el área de la Salud, 

La intención de yhennyfert  era capacitarse día a día  y especializarse en lo que realmente le gustaba, que era el área de la salud, ella piensa que a través de esto lograra obtener grandes cosas, yhennyfert está segura  que con la  inteligencia y grandes  esfuerzos obtendrá ser  una de las mejores del área, está dispuesta a enfrentar temores y miedos porque se  siente en la capacidad  de saber sobrepasarlos. 


Los ideales avanzan a través de los días ya que esta pequeña desea con gran anhelo ayudar de una u otra manera a la familia que en ciertos momentos se ha encontrado en malas condiciones económicas y sociales, es por este motivo que yhennyfert necesita del convenio de kiva, ya que como menciono antes ay momentos en los cuales no se encuentran en la mejor situación económica.
texts.en:
The story of a little girl named Yhennyfert began when she realized at a very young age that she wanted to get an education and help people in exchange for nothing at all.  She started meeting her goals very early on and shared with those who believed in her every moment of happiness, every wish, every goal and every objective.

She worked hard at school and stood out in subjects such as biology and mathematics which allowed her to create new ideas and establish a clear goal.  Although she suffered a lot in life she believed it was only temporary and the obstacles she met were in everyone's way.  Her perseverance allowed her to continue and not let the obstacles get in her way.

Yhennyfert finished high school and knew what she wanted to do.  She also thought about where she would get the money to accomplish her goal of continuing her education.  She had many support groups and did her best in the time necessary to raise the funds so she could study to be a nurse auxiliary.  Her idea for the future was based on her to capacity to contribute much knowledge regarding health care and prevention.

Her intention was to get daily training to specialize in what she really enjoyed, which was health care.  She believes she will be able to achieve many things in this field.  She is sure that through intelligence and hard work she can become one of the best in her field, willing to overcome the challenges and fear she will face.

Her ideals progress daily because this young lady wants to help her family which has suffered poor economic and social conditions.  Therefore, Yhennyfert needs help from Kiva since there are times when she is not in the best financial situation.

loans.use: To pay semester tuition.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en:
Nazia is 42 years old, married and living with her spouse and three children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.

Her husband owns a butcher shop but earns an insufficient income for his family. His daily practice is to buy meat from the market and then sell it from his butcher shop. Recently, he spent a huge part of his income to pay utility bills, which reduces his purchasing power to buy new inventory. 

For this reason; Nazia has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband to buy meat to sell from his butcher shop. She wants to provide a higher education to her children. She dreams of providing all facilities of life to her children.  She is very thankful for BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy meat to sell

loans.name: Kasambya United Boda Boda Association Group

texts.en: Erisa is a member of a village group of motorcycle riders commonly known as Boda Boda. He is a 27-year-old married man with two children who owns a motorcycle in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He has been in the transport business for four years. He started this business with capital saved from riding for others and now has his own motorcycle. He experiences the hardships of competition for clients at stages and poor roads. His vision is to build a simple house for his family. Erisa needs the loan to start the construction of a house.

loans.use: to start construction of a house

loans.name: Rosel

texts.en: Rosel is an active woman who sells fruits and vegetables to the people in their village. She is 41 years old, married and has children she is sending to school who needs daily allowances. That is why she wanted to increase her merchandise and earn additional profit. She is now asking for PHP 5,000 to buy fish, chicken meat, vegetables and bananas to sell. In the future, Rosel would like to keep selling fresh fruits and vegetables and improve her income for her children's future.

loans.use: to buy fish, chicken meat, vegetables and bananas to sell

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen, 26 years old, is from Nyahururu. He is married to Florence and they are blessed with two children who are five and two years old.

He has been running his retail shop business for the last nine years. To enable him to buy more stock of biscuits, sweets and soft drinks to sell to his customers, he has applied for his third loan of KES 30,000 from VisionFund Kenya.

His monthly income currently is KES 10,000. Stephen intends to use the anticipated profits from his expanded business to educate his children and to repay his loan.

In the future, Stephen hopes to be a successful businessman.

loans.use: To buy more stock of biscuits, sweets and soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Remzi

texts.en: Remzi, at 24 years old, is recently married and living with his father, sister and his wife in a small village. In order to earn a living, he sells wood for heating to others in the area as well as honey from the bees he keeps and milk products from his cow. Through these activities, he not only can make an income, but also save on his family’s expenses and provides nutrition. Now he is planning to start a new business raising calves to sell later for profit. In order to do this, he is requesting a loan to purchase a calf as the first step. He hopes to expand his farm in the future. As it is clear that he is a hard worker, Remzi will continue to explore ways to improve his life. He promises to pay on time and is grateful for the support.

loans.use: To purchase a calf

loans.name: Joey

texts.en: Joey is a farmer who is raising his family in a peaceful village. He aims to upgrade their status of living to give his family a better life. Aside from farming, he is also engaged in the hog-raising business to have an additional source of income. Despite hardships, he would like to improve his farming business to generate sufficient income. Due to financial insufficiency, he is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines for his hogs. Being a hard working father, he believes that someday, he will improve his business and their status of living.

loans.use: To buy feed, vitamins and vaccines for his hogs

location.town: Brgy. Munguia,Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Nael

texts.en:
Nael is a 27-year-old single man from Jabalia city. He lives alone in a small simple house. Two years ago, Nael opened a store to sell local perfumes. It is a good business since it is the only one in the area. Nael would like to expand his store and improve it. 

Nael took a USD Murabha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more perfumes for his store to resell. By taking this loan, Nael will be able to improve his store and increase the sales.
 
Nael appears in his store in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more perfumes for his store

loans.name: Eldy Yossely

texts.es: Eldy, tiene 19 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo y reside con su madre y su hijo en el municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Barbara.  Hace 5 años comenzó a vender mercadería para obtener ingresos para su hijo y su madre, vende calcetas, camisas, faldas, blusas, etc.  Esta venta la realiza de manera ambulante y por encargos. Ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 5,000 lempiras para comprar ropa como blusas, camisetas, calcetas, faldas etc.  Para vender y obtener ingresos. Ella piensa poder aumentar su negocio para darle el estudio a su hijo.
texts.en:
Eldy, who is 19 years old, is a single mother. She has a son and lives with her mother and son in the town of Macuelizo, Santa Barbara. Five years ago she started selling goods in order to make an income for her son and her mother. She sells socks, shirts, skirts, blouses etc. She works as a street vendor and also takes orders. 

She has decided to ask for a loan of 5,000 lempiras to buy clothing such as blouses, t-shirts, socks, skirts etc. which she will sell to make an income. She hopes to be able to increase her business so she can provide her son with an education.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as blouses, t-shirts, socks, skirts etc.

loans.name: Cristina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Cristina, solicita un crédito para comprar conejos, pollos de engorde, vitaminas, concentrado, fruta y verduras, aumentara los animales de su granja, los cuidara y luego venderá a buen precio a sus clientes.
El crédito anterior le dio buenos resultados como fortalecer el negocio, mayores ventas, mejores ganancias las cuales le han servido para mantener su buen record crediticio y seguir contribuyendo en los gastos de su familia.
texts.en:
Cristina is asking for a loan to buy rabbits, chickens for fattening, vitamins, concentrated feed, fruit and vegetables. She will increase the number of animals on her farm and will look after them and then sell them to her customers at a good price. 

The previous loan gave her good results such as strengthening the business, increased sales and better profits, which have helped her to keep up her good credit record and continue to contribute to the family's living costs.

loans.use: to buy rabbits, chickens for fattening, vitamins, concentrated feed, fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Señor Nazareno Group

texts.es: El grupo “SEÑOR NAZARENO” está conformada por 07 socios dedicado al comercio minorista. Zusana tiene 53 años de edad es conviviente dedicada a la venta de gaseosas agua sanguche frutas en forma ambulatoria en el peaje de la zona en el cual radica hace muchos años. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más gaseosas agua sanguches y frutas. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Zusana es la primera persona sentado del izquierdo viste polo cuello camisero celeste.
texts.en: The “SEÑOR NAZARENO” group is made up of  7 members who work as retailers. Zusana is 53 years old. She is in a common law marriage and has sold sodas, water, sandwiches and fruit as a street vendor on the toll road where she lives for many years. She will invest the loan in buying more soda, water, sandwiches and fruit. The group thanks the KIVA lenders for the loan. Zusana is the first seated person from the left. She is wearing a light blue polo shirt.

loans.use: to buy more sodas, water, sandwiches and fruit.

loans.name: Abelina

texts.es:
Doña Abelina es una mujer luchadora, feliz de 38 años de edad con un grado de escolaridad de primaria completo y madre de un hijo. Su compañero de hogar también es agricultor al igual que ella quienes se dedican al cultivo de hortalizas (papa) ya que es la única fuente de ingreso para su familia y poder cubrir los gastos en su hogar. Una vez cosechado el producto este es vendido en el mercado local gracias al apoyo de su suegra y con algunos intermediarios que llegan a la zona. A doña Abelina fueron sus padres los que le enseñaron hace mucho tiempo dicha actividad ya que ellos también tenían este rubro como medio de ingreso para el sustento familiar. El terreno que ella y su compañero de hogar cultivan es propio por el cual dan gracias a DIOS. 
Actualmente ella solicita ayuda para la compra de abono, fertilizantes y otros insumos para poder cultivar y poder al mismo tiempo ampliar más sus cultivos de hortalizas los cuales tiene como meta la siembra de lechuga para poder diversificar los mismos y no depender de un solo producto. Sus metas son poder crecer con sus cultivos y con el tiempo abrir un negocio de agropecuaria para la venta de fertilizantes, semillas, que ayudaran al ingreso de su familia y beneficio de la misma.
texts.en:
Abelina is a woman who is a fighter. She is a happy 38 year old with one grade of primary education and the mother of one child. Her household companion is a farmer like she is. They grow vegetables (potatoes). This is the only source of income for their family to cover the household expenses. Once the product is harvested it is sold in the local market, thanks to her mother in law's help and some intermediaries that go to the area. Abelina's parents were the ones who taught her a long time ago about this activity. They also worked in this area to earn income to support the family. The land that she and her household companion work is their own, and for that the thank GOD. 

Right now, she is asking for help to buy fertilizer and other materials to be able to grow and also expand her crops. Her goal is to plant lettuce so she can diversify and not depend on one product. She wants to grow with her crops and over time open a farming and livestock business to sell fertilizers and seeds to help with the family income and for its benefit.

loans.use: to buy agricultural materials to help her potato crops.

loans.name: Marina Hortencia

texts.es: Marina tiene 60 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hijo. A pesar de su edad Marina no se cansa de trabajar y buscar mejores condiciones de vida para ella y para su familia. Marina se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza como: cremas para la piel, cremas para el cabello, champo, etc. De esta forma es como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Marina desea invertir en su negocio dado que desea mejorar sus ventas y al mismo tiempo sus ingresos que le permitan mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de variedad de mercadería como: champo, cremas, accesorios para el cabello, ropa,etc. y así poder cumplir su objetivo de mejorar sus ingresos y sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en: Marina is 60 years old and she lives in her own home with her husband and child. Despite her age, Marina is not tired of working and seeking a better quality of life for her and her family. Marina sells beauty products such as skin creams, hair creams, shampoo, etc. This is how she earns her living and supports her home. Marina wants to invest in her business because she wants to increase her sales and also her income so that she can improve her and her family's quality of life. That is why she is asking FUSAI for this loan to invest in buying a variety of merchandise such as shampoo, creams, hair accessories, clothing, etc. so that she can meet her goal os improving her income and her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, creams, hair accessories, clothing, etc.

loans.name: Ada Lizzeth

texts.es: Ada es una joven de 23 años de edad, agricultora y madre de 2 hijos quienes viven en su hogar junto a su conyugue. Ella tiene un grado de estudio de secundaria incompleta cursando hasta su tercer año de ciclo común ya que por problemas personales ella se retiró. Desde hace varios años se dedica al cultivo de papa siendo este su quinto año actividad que aprendió gracias a su pareja quien también es agricultor dividiéndose las tareas a realizar para sacar el producto con una buena calidad y sentirse parte del mismo al final de cada cosecha. El terreno que ella y su conyugue trabaja es una herencia de sus suegros quienes le apoyaron para poder sembrar u generar sus ingresos evitando de esta manera el alquiler de tierras y la división de las ganancias. El mayor desafío con este negocio son las diferentes plagas que atacan este producto, la variación e inestabilidad de los precios en el mercado al momento de su compra/venta, así como también los diferentes insumos que son aplicados a esta clase de producto y el recorrido que hacen para llegar a ellos el cual es de 10 kilómetros aproximadamente. Ella solicita apoyo económico para la compra de insumos agrícolas y nueva semilla de papa certificada la cual será sembrada para de esa forma ampliar más sus cosechas y con esta próxima temporada generar más ingresos. Sus planes a futuro poder mejorar su casa de habitación la cual necesita mejoras. Sus sueños que sus hijos estudien y puedan prepararse académicamente para que sean personas de bien.
texts.en:
Ada is 23 years old and is a farmer. She has 2 children who live with her and her spouse in their home. She did not complete her secondary education, having studied as far as the third year of general high school, when she gave up because of personal problems. 

For several years she has made a living growing potatoes; this is her fifth year. She learnt the skills from her partner who is also a farmer, and they divide the tasks between themselves so they can obtain a good quality product and feel that they have been part of it at the end of each harvest. She and her spouse inherited the land they work on from his parents, who helped them to plant the potatoes and generate an income. In this way they avoid having to rent land and divide their profits. 

The main challenges in this business come from the various pests which attack the crop; the variation and instability of the market price when buying and selling; the different treatments which are applied to this type of crop; and the distance they have to travel to get to the land, which is approximately 10km.

Ada is asking for financial support to buy the agricultural supplies and new certified seed potatoes for planting, which will increase her harvests more and generate more income in the coming season. 

Her plans for the future are to improve her house, which is in need of improvements. Her dream is for her children to study and have a good education so they can become decent people.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and certified seed potatoes to plant and cultivate.

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es:
Juan es casado y padre dos hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad, pero aún viven con él. Juan es un hombre muy emprendedor que a dedicado la mayor parte de su vida a la crianza y venta de pollos en el mercado, desde hace un año aproximadamemte Juan se dedica a la agricultura cultivando hortalizas de primera calidad, él no pudo estudiar debido a que sus padres eran de escasos recursos; pero con mucho esfuerzo él aprendio el oficio de agricultor y hoy en dia obtiene buenas ganancias de la crianza de pollos, negocio que le permite sostener a su esposa e hijos lo que le ayuda a mejorar su calidad de vida. El trabajo es muy pesado pero los deseos de Juan son muy grandes por eso se siente muy motivado para seguir adelante. 

El préstamo lo necesita para invertir en la granja y una parte para la agriculrura ya que por el momento le hace falta el dinero para seguir comprando y vendiendo pollo y para ir preparando la tierra donde cultivar el maíz.

El sueño mas grande de Juan, es un futuro poder comprar materiales para expandir su negocio y comprar un pequeño terreno para construir mas galeras para produccion de pollos y que esto le genere mas ingresos para que sus hijos puedan terminar sus estudios universitarios.
texts.en:
Juan is a married man with two grown-up children who still live with him. He is a very enterprising man who has dedicated most of his life to breeding and selling chickens at the market.  For about a year he has also been involved in agriculture, growing fine quality vegetables.  He was not able to go to study because his parents did not have very much money; but he worked hard to learn his trade as a farmer and he now generates a good income from breeding chickens.  This business enables him to support his wife and children and helps him to improve their quality of life. It is very hard work but Juan has big ambitions and so he has the motivation to keep going.

He needs the loan to invest in the farm and his crops as he currently lacks the money to continue buying and selling chickens and to prepare land for growing corn.
 
Juan's dearest wish for the future is to be able to buy materials to expand his business and buy a small plot of land to build more pens so he can produce more chickens. As a result, he will be able to boost his income so his children can finish their university studies.

loans.use: to invest in the farm and his crops as he currently lacks the money to continue buying and selling chickens and to prepare land for growing corn.

loans.name: Narcisa Elena

texts.es:
La venta de comida y refrescos fue la primera fuente de ingresos de Narcisa Cardoza a lo largo de veinte años.  El  arduo trabajo y esfuerzo de esta madre soltera dieron frutos, gracias a este pequeño negocio logró  abrir  su propia tienda de abarrotes  en la ciudad de Granada. Con esfuerzo y dedicación ha conseguido mantenerse  a  flote satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes. 
Narcisa también tiene  planes a futuro. Solicita un préstamo para invertir en su tienda, de esa forma ofrecerá a sus clientes  los mismos artículos que ofertan los supermercados. Asimismo  mejorará  la infraestructura del sitio y de su hogar para rentar habitaciones, obteniendo dinero extra. Con el respaldo de KIVA, sus metas poco a poco irán  cumpliéndose.
texts.en: Selling food and soft drinks was Narcisa Cardoza's first source of income for twenty years. This single mother's hard work and effort paid off because her small business enabled her to open her own grocery shop in the city of Granada. Her effort and determination have enabled her to keep the business afloat and meet her customers' needs. Narcisa also has plans for the future. She is applying for a loan to invest in her shop so that she will be able to offer her customers the same goods which are available in supermarkets.  In this way she will improve her business premises and her home so she can rent out rooms, as an extra source of income. With KIVA's support, she is gradually fulfilling her objectives.

loans.use: to invest in her shop so she will be able to offer her customers the same goods which are available in supermarkets.

loans.name: Oscar Nelson

texts.es:
Oscar de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta educacion básica, por el momento esta soltero tienen tres hijas que viven con él, el cliente trabaja con ganado de repasto; ademas como jornal y tiene ayuda economica de un hermano que reside en EE.UU, Oscar se dedica al trabajo con ganado y lo hizo aprendiendo de unos vecinos. 

Necesita el dinero para comprar ganado esto mejorara su condicion de vida y asi poder sostener mejor a sus hijos, la necesidad satisfecha es que puede comprar de una sola vez. Sus sueños son que sus hijos estudien y se preparen academicamente para que puedan tener un mejor futuro, esto le ayduará y mejorará su condicion de vida, porque tenra mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Oscar is 37 years old and has completed his basic education. At the moment he is single and has three children who live with him. He works with grazing animals and also works as a day labourer. He gets financial help from a brother who lives in the US. Oscar makes a living working with livestock and got into this by learning from some neighbours.

He needs the money to buy livestock. This will improve his standard of living and he will be better able to provide for his children. The loan will make it possible for him to buy the animals all in one go. 

His dream is for his children to study and have a good education so that they can have a better future. This will help him and improve his standard of living, as he will have more income.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is sixty-five years old and comes from Nyahururu. He is married to Hannah and they are blessed with four children aged twenty-five, twenty-three, twenty and fourteen.

Robert has been running his fruit and vegetables business for the last twelve years. To enable him to buy more stocks of fruit and vegetables to sell to his customers, he has applied for his third loan of KES 22,500 from VisionFund Kenya.

His monthly income is KES 10,000 and his intention is to use the profits from his expanded business to repay his loan and educate those of his children who are still in school.

In the future, he hopes to be a successful businessman and see his children prosper in life.

loans.use: To buy stocks of fruit and vegetables in bulk to sell

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah used her previous loan from VisionFund Kenya to buy more stocks of goods to sell in her shop. She bought sugar, bars of soap, rice and flour. She has made a profit on these goods.

She will be using this loan to purchase more stocks of goods such as sugar, rice, soap, flour, cooking oil and paraffin for resale. This will enable her to meet the demands of her customers and make a higher profit. She will use the anticipated profits to build a permanent house. 

This is her second loan term with VisionFund Kenya and in future, she hopes to be successful in her business.

loans.use: To purchase more stocks of goods to sell

loans.name: Claudia Mariela

texts.es: Claudia tiene 28 años, estudio hasta septimo grado, esta casada, su esposo trabaja de vendedor de productos desechables. Tienen una hija de siete años de edad y estudia parvularia en la escuela del canton, la cliente tiene ganado de repasto, tienen dos años de dedicarse a este negocio, lo aprendio de la mamá y decidio apoyarse en ella para trabajar, tambien recibe ingresos por parte del esposo. Necesita el crédito para comprar una yunta de terneros, le mejorara porque tendra ganado de repasto y le ayudara, pues podrá tener mayores ganancias, a futuro sueña con tener mas ganado y que su familia siempre sea unida y sobre todo que gocen de buena salud siempre.
texts.en:
Claudia is 28 years old and studied as far as seventh grade. She is married and her husband works selling disposable products. They have a seven-year-old daughter and she goes to the kindergarten in the canton's primary school. 

Claudia has grazing livestock and has had this business for 2 years. She learnt the skills from her mother and decided to use her support in order to work. She also gets an income from her husband.

She needs the loan to buy a pair of bullocks. It will improve things for her as she will have grazing animals and this will help her, as she will be able to make better profits.

In the future she hopes to have more livestock. She hopes her family will always be close and above all that they will always enjoy good health.

loans.use: to buy a pair of bullocks.

loans.name: Makoka Group

texts.en:
Rosemary, who is in her early thirties, is married with three children who are in school. For a period of four years now, she has contributed to her family's living costs by running a rice business. She collects rice from upcountry where plenty of rice is grown. She spends roughly five days upcountry and then comes home and sells her rice. The first small loan she got from Tujijenge was the one which enabled Rosemary to get out of poverty. She can now collect four tons of rice per trip and is really thankful for your support. She sells her business stock from 7am to 3pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

Rosemary is now requesting an eighth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans (all of which she paid back successfully) to buy more stocks of rice. She managed to earn a higher income, which she used to buy a farm of three acres, invest back to her business and cover part of her children's school fees and home food expenses. Rosemary is running this business in association with her husband. She will use this loan to buy stocks of rice from upcountry to resell. She dreams of building a house and managing 15 tons of business stock. 

Rosemary will share this loan with her group "MAKOKA," which totals two members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy stocks of rice from upcountry to resell.

loans.name: Azam Thahban Group

texts.en:
Azam Thahban is a group consisting of four women who live in Sana'a, Yemen. They have applied for a loan of 145,000 YER from AMB.
 
Arwa is a thirty-five-year-old married woman with five children. She lives with them in their own house. She is an uneducated woman and works as a housewife.
